projects.title: Student Performance Insights
projects.description: Final deliverable of my internship at MAIM Digital Solutions, analyzing factors that influence student achievement. Used Pandas, NumPy, Matplotlib, and Seaborn for data analysis, then applied ML models in Scikit-learn to predict grades with strong accuracy.

projects.title: Card Details Form
projects.description: Built an interactive credit card form with real-time preview, input validation, and smooth animations. Designed to be responsive across devices for a seamless user experience.

projects.title: BinWise
projects.description: React + Express web app in progress, focusing on clean architecture and smooth frontendâ€“backend integration. Aiming to deliver a scalable and interactive application.

projects.title: E-Commerce Product Page
projects.description: Responsive product page built from a Figma design with gallery, lightbox, and cart functionality. Showcases how static designs can be turned into polished, interactive websites.

projects.title: AI Sentiment Analysis
projects.description: Scraped tweets with Tweepy, stored them in MongoDB, and analyzed sentiment using Pandas. Visualized results with Matplotlib and Seaborn to reveal trends in public opinion.

projects.title: Student Performance Visualization App
projects.description: Interactive dashboard app in progress using React and D3.js. Designed to make student performance data accessible through dynamic charts and visual insights.
